column1: Funeral services will begin at 10:30 am on Wednesday
column3: 2015 at the Community Hope Church in Montezuma. As was her wish
column4: her body will be cremated following the service. Visitation will be held Tuesday
column6: 2015 beginning at 12:00 pm at the Community Hope Church with the family present to greet family and friends from 4:00 pm to 7:00 pm.
